sections.Situation: Ran receives an anonymous "love" letter that has Conan worried. Ran isn't able to decide if she should go meet this person or not. Then Ran, Conan, and Sonoko help a lady whom had a strange break-in in her home which then eventually leads to saving a man's life.

sections.Resolution: Shuhei tries to chase off Yasuda, a Yakuza man, of whom he has read in the diary trying to press Yuriko to go out with him against her will even going as far as hinting that something might happen to her child if she says no. But as Ran, Sonoko, Conan, and Yuriko arrives, he has been beaten and is trampled on by the man.
sections.Remastered version: A remastered version of this episode aired on February 15, 2014.
